Type.Name: EventNotificationHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void EventNotificationHandler (object o, Gda.EventNotificationArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the EventNotificationHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the EventNotificationHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the EventNotificationHandler is removed from the event.
